# Documentation

This folder contains the detailed documentation for the notebook-first MCP inspector.

Start here:

- `docs/quickstart.md`: run the notebook UI and connect to example servers
- `docs/notebook-scripting.md`: script-first workflow (recommended)
- `docs/architecture.md`: components and responsibilities
- `docs/transports.md`: stdio/http/sse transport model and configuration
- `docs/writing-servers.md`: how to build simple MCP servers for testing

## Example notebooks

See `examples/README.md` for the current notebook list.
